name: Stop Motion (V)
Lore: '''Your tauntaun''ll freeze before you reach the first marker.''',
Text: 'Take Cold Feet, He Hasn''t Come Back Yet, or Ice Storm into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR Cancel Dodge. OR Cancel opponent''s ''react'' away from battle. OR Cancel opponent''s attempt to randomly remove one or more cards from your hand (except with Grimtaash).',
